title: Skin Concept for Draven. [ Master Chef Draven ], Very rough Sketch
body:
Skin Name: Master Chef Draven

(I am a beginner at drawing with my tablet so don't expect a professional work.) 
This is Just a very rough sketch made by myself.
I do not know how to make a Splash art, so if anyone is interested please make one if you know how to do it.
Would appreciate any feedback.

{{champion:119}} {{champion:119}} {{champion:119}} {{champion:119}} {{champion:119}} 

https://i.redd.it/i4swgr79ju2x.png

replies.body: Enlarge the mustache, give him a hair net instead of a chef hat, and shorten his leg and I think we have a new skin in the works {{champion:119}}
he be french. Whom of which are out of proportion.
